COUNTRY WINES OF EUROPE

BERGERAC ROUGE 1973, Fagette

Among the unsung heroes of French viniculture is this honest, flavorful red wine from the Valley of the Dordogne east of Bordeaux, Full-bodied and satisfying, this Bergerac represents a perfect hearty wine for everyday.

LAKE BALATON RIESLING (Hungary)

Lake Balaton, the beautiful lake whose north coast is Hungary's Riviera, is the home of some of the best Magyar table wines, Try this pleasingly inexpensive bottle and be amazed at the ingenuous joy that awaits you,
